general_advisory: Harvest the damaged and fallen crops due to the impact of Cyclone 'DANA'. Drain out excess water from the field. Let the field dry on its own then prepare it for sowing of Rabi crops. Do not plough the land if it is in a wet condition. Spraying of pesticides to be done in the early morning hours. Do not spray if rainfall is forecasted. Sowing of Rabi crops should be done with proper seed treatment.
